clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of a Modified XELOX Regimen in First-Line Treatment of Metastatic Colorectal Adenocarcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Trial Evaluating a Modified Regimen of Oxaliplatin and Capecitabine in First-Line Treatment of Metastatic Colorectal Adenocarcinoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

clinical_study.source: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a modified regimen of oxaliplatin and capecitabine on metastatic colorectal adenocarcinoma in the first-line therapy.

detailed_description.textblock:
Primary endpoint: Overall Response Rate
Secondary endpoint: Time to progression, overall survival, safety data

primary_outcome.measure: Overall response rate according to RECIST 1.1

intervention.description: Oxaliplatin 85mg/m2 D1 and capecitabine 1g/m2 BID D1-D10, repeat every two weeks. Efficacy will be evaluated every three cycles.
